enhanced_description: Practical Magic Advisory Services & Solutions is a professional boutique HR Advisory & Leadership Consulting firm launched in 2015, committed to helping organizations transform their human capital to meet the challenges of the global economy. They offer integrated strategic organization solutions, specializing in Recruiting, including Executive Search and Staffing services, and Learning & Development. Their services encompass Leadership & Organization Development, Entrepreneurship Mentoring, and Customer Experience training. Practical Magic delivers customized programs for capability building, including e-learning/online cohorts, immersive experiential training, outbound experiential training, and leadership coaching.
